name: TOMS MALY
top_product: Wipro Switches, Crompton Fans, Atomberg Fans, Wipro Lighting, Philips Lighting, Panasonic Switches, Panasonic Lighting
ideal_referral: Architects, Interior Designers, Electrical Contractor, Electrical Consultants, Builders, Interior Contractors
top_problem_solved: Proper Lighting Solutions instead of selling products
my_favourite_bni_story: When I first joined BNI, I honestly wasn’t sure what to expect. As an electrical dealer, most of my business came from contractors and walk-ins. But I soon learned the true power of structured networking. A few months into my BNI journey, I gave a feature presentation about how we support builders and interior designers with high-quality electrical materials and timely deliveries. After the meeting, one of the members – a contractor – approached me and said, “I didn’t know you carried that brand. I’ve been looking for a reliable supplier.” That one conversation led to a trial order, which quickly turned into regular business. But it didn’t stop there. He referred me to two of his builder contacts. Then those builders introduced me to their electricians. In less than six months, what started as one referral turned into a strong supply chain that brought in repeat orders and new business worth over ₹10 lakhs.
